title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (Part 8)
description: Dorothy frees the Lion and rescues the Tin Woodman and the Scarecrow with the help of the newly liberated Winkies. Using the power of the Golden Cap, Dorothy commands the Winged Monkeys to carry the companions back to the Emerald City.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
